mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cardlist (p_id, u_id, title) VALUES (#{p_id}, #{u_id}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT cl.p_id , cl.id AS cl_id , cl.u_id AS cl_u_id , cl.title AS cl_title , cl.cdate AS cl_cdate , cl.udate AS cl_udate , cl.ps_id AS cl_ps_id , c.id AS c_id , c.u_id AS c_u_id , c.title AS c_title , c.content , c.cdate AS c_cdate , c.udate AS c_udate , c.ps_id AS c_ps_id FROM cardlist cl LEFT JOIN card c ON cl.id = c.cl_id WHERE p_id = #{p_id} AND cl.ps_id = 1 AND (c.ps_id = 1 OR c.ps_id IS NULL)
SELECT id , p_id , u_id , title , ps_id FROM cardlist WHERE ps_id = #{ps_id}
